nodes.text: Palpatine is an overview of the life of Palpatine, alias Darth Sidious, written by Daniel Wallace and published in Star Wars Insider 113. It started with Palpatine's origins from the planet Naboo, where he was taken, then trained by the Sith Lord Darth Plagueis. The article continues on with his rise to power from a mere Senator to being elected as the Supreme Chancellor of the Galactic Republic, then followed by the Clone Wars which Palpatine orchestrated. The final part is Palpatine's ascent as the Emperor of the Galactic Empire, his eventual death aboard the Second Death Star and his later appearances in clone bodies. The article was later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2013.
